resources.string: NaukriHack
Naukri.com
Open navigation drawer
Close navigation drawer
Settings
These are some of the most frequently asked questions about naukri.com.Do write to us on android@naukri.com for more queries.

By default the results are sorted on Relevance. You can change this from the ‘Refine’ layer by pressing the icon on the top right side of the screen. Change the ‘Sort By’ setting from ‘Relevance’ to ‘Freshness’ to see the latest jobs.
Please make sure you have an active internet connection and try again. If the issue still persists, contact us with details on ‘android@naukri.com’.

At times on a slow internet connection it might take some time to reflect the changes. You should wait for a few minutes and see if it’s updated. If not, please contact us with details on ‘android@naukri.com’.
If it’s still red, that means there is something that needs your attention. For example, in the ‘Employment Details’ section, the ‘Job Profile’ field should have a minimum of 5 words
Once you have installed either of the applications, please make sure you sign-in to those applications. The option to upload might not be available if you are not signed in.
This might happen if there are a lot of applications running on your device. We recommend you close the other running apps.
Please uninstall the existing app and re-install the app from the Google Play Store. Also, please let us know about this by writing to us on ‘android@naukri.com’.
You can access the saved jobs from the ‘Jobs for You’ Screen link in the main navigation.
If you don’t see new jobs there, it means no new matching jobs have been posted since the last time you checked. It would be a good idea to keep checking this screen every now and then for new jobs.
Please make sure you have updated your key skills in your profile. Relevant and updated key skills will help us find the right jobs for you.
You can apply to 50 jobs in one day.
You can apply to 150 jobs in a month.
The apply limit is reset on the 1st day of every month.
The screen can be ‘Pulled Down’ to refresh. Once you refresh the screen, the latest jobs applied to will start appearing as well.

Always ensure you apply to the relevant jobs only. Some recruiters might take time in going through all the applications before contacting the applicants. Whenever a recruiter views or downloads your profile, that info will be updated in the ‘Profile Performance’ screen in the app.
